app.name: Quivr
app.short_description: Generate and rephrase responses to Zendesk tickets with AI-powered assistance.
app.long_description:
## Quivr  
Quivr is an open-source Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) AI designed to enhance knowledge management and content generation. It enables users to efficiently retrieve, generate, and refine text using advanced AI capabilities, making it a powerful tool for automation and productivity.  


## Quivr for Zendesk  
Quivr for Zendesk integrates Quivr directly into your Zendesk workflow, empowering support agents with AI-driven assistance:  

- ✨ **AI-Powered Suggestions**: Generate, refine, and improve responses effortlessly.  
- 🔍 **Context-Aware AI**: Uses full ticket context, including customer details and conversation history.  
- 🏆 **Efficiency Boost**: Speeds up ticket resolution and enhances agent productivity.  
- 🔄 **Seamless Integration**: Work with Quivr AI directly inside Zendesk.  

**Note:** Requires an active Quivr account.
app.installation_instructions:
## Installation Instructions  
Click **Install**, then provide:  
- 🗝️ Your **Quivr API key**  
- 🔑 Your **Zendesk API key**  
- 🏢 Your **Quivr Workspace ID** (found in the user section of [quivr.app](https://quivr.app))  

You're all set to enhance your Zendesk experience!
